Anthropic's Claude 3.5 performed the second best, blocking 64% of the attacks, while the preview version of Open AI's o1 took the top spot with 74%.

articles.title: In the room where A.I. happened

articles.summary: The Stanford Artificial Intelligence Laboratory at the Gates Computer Science Building housed a community of researchers and thinkers dedicated to pushing the boundaries of artificial intelligence. Today, AI-powered writing tools are readily available, capable of churning out articles, stories, and even entire books. Some believe their work holds the key to a utopian future, a world where disease is eradicated, aging is reversed, and humans achieve unprecedented levels of well-being and leisure. articles.title: How DeepSeek Has Blown Open AI Race Between US and China

articles.summary: Chinese startup DeepSeek has sent shock waves through the artificial intelligence world and created a headache for the United States. Its AI assistant overtook Western rival ChatGPT on January 27 to become the top-rated free app on Apple's App Store in the U.S. It is the brainchild of Liang Wenfeng, a former hedge fund manager who transitioned to AI development in 2023. His platform's flagship model sparked the largest single-day loss in stock market history, wiping billions off the valuations of tech giants like Microsoft and chipmakers Nvidia and Broadcom.
